traits.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Malison Type
entries: The yuan-ti has one of the following types:

items.name: Type 2:
items.entry: Human head and body with snakes for arms

items.name: Type 3:
items.entry: Human head and upper body with a serpentine lower body instead of legs

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can constrict only once.

actions.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
